text: Frederick Trump (nee Freidrich Drumpf March 14, 1869 â€“ March 30, 1918) was a German businessman. He is the father of businessman Fred Trump and the grandfather of Donald Trump. Trump made his first fortune operating boom-town hotels and whorehouses in the northwestern United States, and later in Monte Cristo, Washington. ==References== Category:1869 births Category:1918 deaths Category:Businesspeople from Seattle Category:Businesspeople from New York City
title: Frederick Trump
